# Pull Request Template

## Description

Brief description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Configuration improvement
- [ ] Security enhancement
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Changes Made

- [ ] Modified nginx configuration files
- [ ] Updated Docker Compose files
- [ ] Changed Makefile commands
- [ ] Updated documentation
- [ ] Added new features
- [ ] Fixed bugs

## Testing

Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes.

- [ ] Tested nginx configuration syntax (`nginx -t`)
- [ ] Tested development environment startup
- [ ] Tested production environment startup
- [ ] Verified routing works correctly
- [ ] Tested rate limiting (if applicable)
- [ ] Verified security headers
- [ ] Tested maintenance mode (if applicable)
- [ ] Checked logs for errors

## Environment Tested

- [ ] Development environment
- [ ] Production environment
- [ ] Both environments

## Configuration Files Modified

List any nginx or Docker configuration files that were modified:

- [ ] `nginx/nginx-development.conf`
- [ ] `nginx/nginx-production.conf`
- [ ] `docker-compose.development.yml`
- [ ] `docker-compose.production.yml`
- [ ] `Makefile`
- [ ] Other: ******\_\_\_******

## Security Considerations

- [ ] No security implications
- [ ] Security improvements included
- [ ] Potential security impact (explained below)

If there are security implications, please explain:

## Performance Impact

- [ ] No performance impact
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Potential performance impact (explained below)

If there is performance impact, please explain:

## Breaking Changes

- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] Breaking changes (documented below)

If there are breaking changes, please document:

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added comments to complex configuration sections
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md if needed

## Additional Notes

Add any additional notes, context, or screenshots here.
